title: New: Dilly Dally – Desire
body:
Unrelenting, unforgiving, and entirely unfastened, Dilly Dally’s ‘Desire’ has a raw essence that is gilt edged with a purposeful raucousness.

While lodged in a foundation of grunge heritage, there are musical reference points which extend further, including throws to Smashing Pumpkins. Hailing from Toronto, and with their debut album due out on Partisan (US) and Buzz (CAN) on October 9th, we can’t wait for Dilly Dally to cross to the pond.
